data.title: We reserve the right to refuse service...
data.text:
...and they do!  

We love to support local business and wanted to try "Bistro to Go" for ourselves, despite reports of poor service from peers - but were told to leave just as we were being seated!  Evidently, the owner didn't like one of the guests in our party.

With no other patrons in the restaurant at 12:30 on a weekday, our group should have been a welcome sight.  I guess pride and pettiness trump civility and service at Bistro to Go.
